report.title: Number of plots per species
report.description: Report returns a count of the number of distinct plots that individual taxa have been recorded against. When reporting on an individual taxon, the report will return data for any taxa with the same meaning, so it is possible to still see data in the report grid even if it doesn't include the exact taxon name that was searched for.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences co JOIN samples samp on samp.id=co.sample_id AND samp.survey_id in (#limit_survey_ids#) AND samp.deleted = false JOIN locations plot on plot.id=samp.location_id AND plot.parent_id IS NOT NULL AND plot.deleted=false #joins# WHERE 1=1 AND samp.date_start >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date) AND #website_filter# #filters#

param.name: taxa_taxon_list_id
param.join: JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.taxon_meaning_id=co.taxon_meaning_id AND ttl.deleted=false

param.name: ignore_dates_before
param.description: Ignore samples whose date is before this date (we can ignore previous years data).

param.name: limit_survey_ids
param.description: Survey IDs to limit results to when all surveys are being returned by the user.
